resources.string:
This app currently has 4 sections:

Add Contact:

Add a new contact, as long as the email address has a correct format.
The Save Contact button is enabled when the verification is successful.
You can also add test contacts to see how the data is displayed in the Contacts section UI.

Contacts:

View a list of previously saved contacts.
Use the menu on the right of each list item to update or delete contacts.
Search for contacts by entering their last name.
The search will return a result or a list empty message if no matches are found in the database.

Information:

Provides a description of the app\'s features and a button to reset the entire database of saved contacts.
Displays the app\'s version number at the bottom, indicating the version currently installed on the device.

Edit Contact:

Allows you to update the information of a particular contact.
The Save button is enabled only if the email address has a correct format (if it has been changed).
Deleted all contacts from address book
No contacts available. Please add one contact before.
Error during the operation, please try again.
